scene1.title: Wedding Day
scene1.subtitle: Some moments are meant to last forever
scene1.description: A couple getting married, capturing a moment that should endure through time.

scene2.title: Photo Album Across Generations
scene2.subtitle: Three generations, one photograph, a lifetime of stories
scene2.description: The bride, now a grandmother, showing her wedding photo to her daughter and granddaughter.

scene3.title: Grandmother's Deathbed
scene3.subtitle: Time passes, and we with it. Family remains
scene3.description: The grandmother, surrounded by family in a hospital bed.

scene4.title: Grandmother's House Burning
scene4.subtitle: Memories are fragile. Houses burn down. Ashes to ashes
scene4.description: The house burning, with the wedding photo consumed by flames in the foreground, while the grandmother is dying.

scene5.title: AWS Shutdown and Storage Deletion
scene5.subtitle: You trusted Jeff's cloud. Now it's vaporized
scene5.description: A diptych: on one side, an email announcing 'Service Discontinuation' and 'Your stored memories have been deleted. We thank you for your loyalty over the years'; on the other side, Jeff Bezos himself shutting down the servers where these precious memories were supposedly safe.

scene6.title: Resolution through Futura
scene6.subtitle: We are your happy end
scene6.description: People looking at the wedding photo through Futura, perfectly preserved despite all previous disasters.

valueJourney.conclusion: With Futura, your memories survive fires, outlive tech giants, and defy time itself. Some things deserve to be truly immortal.
